speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Mike from XYZ Collections, how are you today?

speaker: Customer
text: What the hell do you want? I'm busy!

speaker: Agent
text: I understand you’re busy, but I'm calling about your overdue account. Can I take a moment of your time?

speaker: Customer
text: You can shove it! I'm not paying a damn thing!

speaker: Agent
text: I appreciate your feedback. Can I at least confirm some information regarding your account first?

speaker: Customer
text: I don't give a crap about your stupid questions!

speaker: Agent
text: I understand your frustration. However, if you could just verify your address, I can provide the details on your balance.

speaker: Customer
text: Why the hell would I do that? Just tell me what you want!

speaker: Agent
text: Right now, your account shows a balance of $500. It’s crucial to discuss your options to resolve this.

speaker: Customer
text: Oh, like I’m just gonna hand over my cash to you! Not a chance!

speaker: Agent
text: I completely understand, and I’m here to help you find a solution. Let’s talk about a payment plan.

speaker: Customer
text: You really think I’m gonna listen to your bullshit? Get lost!

speaker: Agent
text: I’m just trying to assist you. Please understand that ignoring it will only make things worse.

speaker: Customer
text: I said no! And you can’t make me do anything!

speaker: Agent
text: I respect your decision, but I’ll have to inform you that there may be further actions if this isn’t resolved.
